summary: A damaged privateer deserts the Spanish Armada and makes land for repairs near a village on the British coast, terrorizing the local inhabitants.
cast: Christopher Lee|Andrew Keir|John Cairney|Duncan Lamont|Michael Ripper|Ernest Clark|Barry Warren|Suzan Farmer|Natasha Pyne|Annette Whiteley|Charles Houston|Philip Latham|Harry Locke|Leonard Fenton|Jack Rodney|Barry Linehan|Bruce Beeby|Michael Peake|Johnny Briggs|Michael Newport|Peter Howell|Jane Ellis|Bill Brandon|Joseph O'Conor
title: Los piratas del diablo
